00011 #ifndef __DATETIME_H__
00012 #define __DATETIME_H__

00017 BEGIN_FASTDB_NAMESPACE
00018 
00019 class FASTDB_DLL_ENTRY dbDateTime { 
00020   protected:
00021     int4 stamp;
00022   public:
00023     bool operator == (dbDateTime const& dt) const { 
00024         return stamp == dt.stamp;
00025     }
00026     bool operator != (dbDateTime const& dt) const { 
00027         return stamp != dt.stamp;
00028     }
00029     bool operator > (dbDateTime const& dt) const { 
00030         return stamp > dt.stamp;
00031     }
00032     bool operator >= (dbDateTime const& dt) const { 
00033         return stamp >= dt.stamp;
00034     }
00035     bool operator < (dbDateTime const& dt) const { 
00036         return stamp < dt.stamp;
00037     }
00038     bool operator <= (dbDateTime const& dt) const { 
00039         return stamp <= dt.stamp;
00040     }
00041     int operator - (dbDateTime const& dt) const { 
00042         return stamp - dt.stamp;
00043     }
00044     int operator + (dbDateTime const& dt) const { 
00045         return stamp + dt.stamp;
00046     }
00047     static dbDateTime current() { 
00048         return dbDateTime(time(NULL));
00049     }
00050     dbDateTime(time_t tm) {
00051         stamp = (int4)tm;
00052     }
00053     dbDateTime() { 
00054         stamp = -1;
00055     } 
00056     bool isValid() const { 
00057         return stamp != -1;
00058     }
00059 
00060     time_t asTime_t() const { return stamp; }
00061 
00062     void clear() { stamp = -1; }
00063 
00064     dbDateTime(int year, int month, int day, 
00065                int hour=0, int min=0, int sec = 0) 
00066     { 
00067         struct tm t;
00068         t.tm_year = year > 1900 ? year - 1900 : year;
00069         t.tm_mon = month-1;
00070         t.tm_mday = day;
00071         t.tm_hour = hour;
00072         t.tm_min = min;
00073         t.tm_sec = sec;
00074         t.tm_isdst = -1;
00075         stamp = (int4)mktime(&t);
00076     }
00077     dbDateTime(int hour, int min) { 
00078         stamp = (hour*60+min)*60;
00079     }
00080 
00081 #if defined(HAVE_LOCALTIME_R) && !defined(NO_PTHREADS)
00082     int year() { 
00083         struct tm t;
00084         time_t tt = (nat4)stamp;
00085         return localtime_r(&tt, &t)->tm_year + 1900;
00086     }
00087     int month() { // 1..12
00088         struct tm t;
00089         time_t tt = (nat4)stamp;
00090         return localtime_r(&tt, &t)->tm_mon + 1;
00091     }
00092     int day() { // 1..31
00093         struct tm t;
00094         time_t tt = (nat4)stamp;
00095         return localtime_r(&tt, &t)->tm_mday;
00096     }
00097     int dayOfYear() { // 1..366
00098         struct tm t;
00099         time_t tt = (nat4)stamp;
00100         return localtime_r(&tt, &t)->tm_yday+1;
00101     }
00102     int dayOfWeek() { // 1..7
00103         struct tm t;
00104         time_t tt = (nat4)stamp;
00105         return localtime_r(&tt, &t)->tm_wday+1;
00106     }
00107     int hour() { // 0..24
00108         struct tm t;
00109         time_t tt = (nat4)stamp;
00110         return localtime_r(&tt, &t)->tm_hour;
00111     }
00112     int minute() { // 0..59
00113         struct tm t;
00114         time_t tt = (nat4)stamp;
00115         return localtime_r(&tt, &t)->tm_min;
00116     }
00117     int second() { // 0..59
00118         struct tm t;
00119         time_t tt = (nat4)stamp;
00120         return localtime_r(&tt, &t)->tm_sec;
00121     }
00122     char* asString(char* buf, int buf_size, char const* format = "%c") const { 
00123         struct tm t;
00124         time_t tt = (nat4)stamp;
00125         strftime(buf, buf_size, format, localtime_r(&tt, &t));
00126         return buf;
00127     }
00128     static dbDateTime currentDate() { 
00129         struct tm t;
00130         time_t curr = time(NULL);
00131         localtime_r(&curr, &t);
00132         t.tm_hour = 0;
00133         t.tm_min = 0;
00134         t.tm_sec = 0;
00135         return dbDateTime(mktime(&t));
00136     }
00137 #else
00138     int year() { 
00139         time_t tt = (nat4)stamp;
00140         return localtime(&tt)->tm_year + 1900;
00141     }
00142     int month() { // 1..12
00143         time_t tt = (nat4)stamp;
00144         return localtime(&tt)->tm_mon + 1;
00145     }
00146     int day() { // 1..31
00147         time_t tt = (nat4)stamp;
00148         return localtime(&tt)->tm_mday;
00149     }
00150     int dayOfYear() { // 1..366
00151         time_t tt = (nat4)stamp;
00152         return localtime(&tt)->tm_yday+1;
00153     }
00154     int dayOfWeek() { // 1..7
00155         time_t tt = (nat4)stamp;
00156         return localtime(&tt)->tm_wday+1;
00157     }
00158     int hour() { // 0..24
00159         time_t tt = (nat4)stamp;
00160         return localtime(&tt)->tm_hour;
00161     }
00162     int minute() { // 0..59
00163         time_t tt = (nat4)stamp;
00164         return localtime(&tt)->tm_min;
00165     }
00166     int second() { // 0..59
00167         time_t tt = (nat4)stamp;
00168         return localtime(&tt)->tm_sec;
00169     }
00170     char* asString(char* buf, int buf_size, char const* format = "%c") const { 
00171         time_t tt = (nat4)stamp;
00172 #ifdef _WINCE
00173         struct tm* t = localtime(&tt);
00174         char cnvBuf[CNV_BUF_SIZE];
00175         sprintf(cnvBuf, "%02d/02d/%40d %02d:%02d:%02d", t->tm_mon, t->tm_yday+1, t->tm_year + 1900,
00176                 t->tm_hour, t->tm_min, t->tm_sec);
00177         strncpy(buf, cnvBuf, buf_size);
00178 #else
00179         strftime(buf, buf_size, format, localtime(&tt));
00180 #endif
00181         return buf;
00182     }
00183     static dbDateTime currentDate() { 
00184         time_t curr = time(NULL);
00185         struct tm* tp = localtime(&curr);;
00186         tp->tm_hour = 0;
00187         tp->tm_min = 0;
00188         tp->tm_sec = 0;
00189         return dbDateTime(mktime(tp));
00190     }
00191 #endif    
00192 
00193     CLASS_DESCRIPTOR(dbDateTime, 
00194                      (KEY(stamp,INDEXED|HASHED), 
00195                       METHOD(year), METHOD(month), METHOD(day),
00196                       METHOD(dayOfYear), METHOD(dayOfWeek),
00197                       METHOD(hour), METHOD(minute), METHOD(second)));
00198 
00199     dbQueryExpression operator == (char const* field) { 
00200         dbQueryExpression expr;
00201         expr = dbComponent(field,"stamp"),"=",stamp;
00202         return expr;
00203     }
00204     dbQueryExpression operator != (char const* field) { 
00205         dbQueryExpression expr;
00206         expr = dbComponent(field,"stamp"),"<>",stamp;
00207         return expr;
00208     }
00209     dbQueryExpression operator < (char const* field) { 
00210         dbQueryExpression expr;
00211         expr = dbComponent(field,"stamp"),">",stamp;
00212         return expr;
00213     }
00214     dbQueryExpression operator <= (char const* field) { 
00215         dbQueryExpression expr;
00216         expr = dbComponent(field,"stamp"),">=",stamp;
00217         return expr;
00218     }
00219     dbQueryExpression operator > (char const* field) { 
00220         dbQueryExpression expr;
00221         expr = dbComponent(field,"stamp"),"<",stamp;
00222         return expr;
00223     }
00224     dbQueryExpression operator >= (char const* field) { 
00225         dbQueryExpression expr;
00226         expr = dbComponent(field,"stamp"),"<=",stamp;
00227         return expr;
00228     }
00229     friend dbQueryExpression between(char const* field, dbDateTime& from,
00230                                      dbDateTime& till)
00231     { 
00232         dbQueryExpression expr;
00233         expr=dbComponent(field,"stamp"),"between",from.stamp,"and",till.stamp;
00234         return expr;
00235     }
00236 
00237     static dbQueryExpression ascent(char const* field) { 
00238         dbQueryExpression expr;
00239         expr=dbComponent(field,"stamp");
00240         return expr;
00241     }   
00242     static dbQueryExpression descent(char const* field) { 
00243         dbQueryExpression expr;
00244         expr=dbComponent(field,"stamp"),"desc";
00245         return expr;
00246     }   
00247 };
